nodes.text: "Mad Akk" Geden was a male Rattataki who was a former Mandalorian and a member of the Terror Brigade. A Force-sensitive who exhibited powers such as Force lightning, Geden fought with a melee weapon in battle, and was defeated by Galactic Republic forces as part of the Onslaught challenges held by the Terror Brigade on Hoth.
Geden appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an enemy in the Heroic mission "The Terror Brigade" on Hoth for Republic players.
